message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer and understand the value of the product. However, my budget is limited. Would you consider selling it for $16000?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell it to you for $17000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I'm glad we're getting closer. Considering my budget, would you be willing to sell the product for $16500?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'll sell the product to you for $16800.
I appreciate your willingness to adjust, Alice. Considering my financial situation, would you be open to selling the product for $16600?
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I'll meet you at $16700, but that's as low as I can go.
I respect your position, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could you possibly lower the price to $16650?
I understand you're trying to squeeze every last dollar out of the deal, Bob. I'll meet you at $16600, but that's my final offer.
I've considered your last offer, Alice. Given my financial situation, I believe $16550 is the maximum I can pay for the product.
